hotel_name: Fairfield by Marriott Hokkaido Eniwa
title: A hotel for relaxβ€
content:
Better with car, around 30mins drive to outlet, airport, city. A beautiful park with flowers surrounded the hotel, souvenir shop, bakery and curry shop in walking distance. 

Hotel has a beautiful common areas with microwaves and oven, u can reheat your meal and sitting outdoor to enjoy the environment. 

The bed is very comfortable, modern design but not practical, too little space to organize your stuffs. 

No public bath but onsen near by in 5 mins drive

hotel_name: Fairfield by Marriott Hokkaido Eniwa
title: A hotel for relaxβ€
content:
Better with car, around 30mins drive to outlet, airport, city. A beautiful park with flowers surrounded the hotel, souvenir shop, bakery and curry shop in walking distance. 

Hotel has a beautiful common areas with microwaves and oven, u can reheat your meal and sitting outdoor to enjoy the environment. 

The bed is very comfortable, modern design but not practical, too little space to organize your stuffs. 

No public bath but onsen near by in 5 mins drive

content: very good place

hotel_name: λ² μ…€ νΈν…” μΊ„νλ‚ μ¤μ¤ν‚¤λ…Έ (Vessel Hotel Campana Susukino)
title: A great stay with exceptional dining, but room for improvement in communicationβ€
content:
I was generally very satisfied with my experience, there were a few areas where improvement could be made. The hotel itself was small, but the rooms were very well-maintained and the bathroom facilities were excellent. However, I did encounter some communication issues with the staff, particularly those working at the reception desk, who seemed to stuggle with his English. This made some aspects of my stay less convenient than they could have been. 

Despite this, the hightlight of my stay was undoubtedly the food. The breakfast buffet was truly exceptional, and I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is passionate about good food!
